capability.name: Advanced Voice Services Management
capability.definition: Oversee the configuration and operation of the voice channel facilities
capability.role: Handles the oversight and configuration of the PBX (telephony/voice) access channel. This includes assessing capacity, performance, scheduling maintenance and updates to the channel configuration. Also determining allowed access and usage and troubleshooting major production problems
capability.example: Management review and define the reconfiguration requirements for the voice channel based on capacity/volume projections

key_features.name: Determine the required voice channel platform configuration
key_features.description: Enables determine the required voice channel platform configuration to support oversee the configuration and operation of the voice channel facilities

key_features.name: Oversee platform upgrades and maintenance
key_features.description: Enables oversee platform upgrades and maintenance to support oversee the configuration and operation of the voice channel facilities

key_features.name: Track service availability and troubleshoot major production issues
key_features.description: Enables track service availability and troubleshoot major production issues to support oversee the configuration and operation of the voice channel facilities
